stimulusHtml: Which of the following ways best explains how the United States attempted to influence the outside world following the conclusion of the First World War?
choicesHtml: It established mutual defense treaties to discourage war from occurring.
It granted independence to colonies such as the Philippines to encourage European countries to end their empires.
It used trade and investment in order to maintain international connections.
It contributed to rebuilding European militaries in order to discourage invasions.
